lines.text: Alert at all times to enforce the laws of our maritime code, the Harbor Command is trained to combat every type of criminal. It is an organization designed to protect our harbors. These are the stories of the men who have dedicated their lives to that end.

We gratefully dedicate this program to the men who constantly risk their lives fighting every danger to protect our harbor areas. We wish to thank the port of San Francisco for its cooperation in making the authentic production of this picture possible.
